attributes.action: ban the wearing of knives (kirpans) in the name of religion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to ban the wearing of knives (kirpans) in the name of religion. Recent attacks by Sikhs show that the knife is not being used as a ceremonial item, but is being used as a weapon. It is also used as a form of intimidation, when the Sikhs are not able to push through their views by conventional methods of debate.
